title: [Descent] MVP Roguelike Mode
description: Traditional DCSS-faithful roguelike mode with turn-based action economy, shadowcasting FOV, 5 floors with procgen, boss encounter, 15-20 min runs, and reproducible seeded gameplay. MVP includes Human/Gladiator, Trog god, 3 spells, 5 enemies + boss. See planning/PLAN.md for full spec.

title: [Descent] A1 Spec snapshot + spec.lua mirror
description: Create planning/descent_spec.md with all decisions from ยง3.2 explicit (movement, turn costs, FOV, combat, HP/MP/XP, floors, inventory, scrolls, boss, backtracking). Create assets/scripts/descent/spec.lua as code mirror. Tests import only spec.lua for constants. ACCEPTANCE: All ยง3.2 decisions explicit with numeric values, require('descent.spec') returns table.

comments.author: ubuntu
comments.text:
# A1 Spec Snapshot + spec.lua mirror

- Added `planning/descent_spec.md` with explicit decisions for movement, turn costs, FOV, combat, HP/MP/XP, floors, inventory, scrolls, boss, and backtracking.
- Added `assets/scripts/descent/spec.lua` as a code mirror for constants used by runtime/tests.

Tests: not run (spec/data-only changes).

title: [Descent] C2-T Map grid tests
description: Create tests for map.lua. Test grid creation, occupancy checks, bounds validation, coordinate conversions. ACCEPTANCE: All map tests pass.

title: [Descent] C3 Input + player action selection
description: Create assets/scripts/descent/input.lua and actions_player.lua. Legal move consumes 1 turn, illegal 0. Bump enemy creates melee action. Key repeat: 1 action per player turn. ACCEPTANCE: Tests verify turn consumption, bump-attack, key repeat.

title: [Descent] C3-T Input and movement tests
description: Test input handling: legal/illegal moves, bump attacks, key repeat policy across frames. ACCEPTANCE: All input/movement tests pass.

title: [Descent] C4 FOV + explored tracking
description: Create assets/scripts/descent/fov.lua. Shadowcasting FOV per spec. Occlusion correct, bounds safe at edges/corners. Explored persists after LOS loss. ACCEPTANCE: FOV tests pass, screenshots show correct visibility.

title: [Descent] C4-T FOV tests
description: Test FOV algorithm: occlusion, bounds safety, explored persistence, corner cases. ACCEPTANCE: All FOV tests pass.

title: [Descent] D1 RNG adapter + seed parsing + HUD display
description: Create assets/scripts/descent/rng.lua. All randomness through this module (no math.random). Create assets/scripts/descent/ui/hud.lua showing seed/floor/turn/pos. DESCENT_SEED=123 produces stable sequences. Invalid seed falls back with warning. ACCEPTANCE: Determinism tests pass, HUD shows seed.

title: [Descent] D1-T RNG determinism tests
description: Test RNG: same seed = identical sequences. Scripted sequences produce deterministic combat/AI. ACCEPTANCE: All RNG determinism tests pass.

title: [Descent] D2a Pathfinding (deterministic)
description: Create assets/scripts/descent/pathfinding.lua. BFS/A* returns stable path for same map+endpoints. Neighbor order explicit and tested. Unreachable returns nil, callers handle without crash. ACCEPTANCE: Pathfinding tests pass with documented neighbor order.

title: [Descent] D2a-T Pathfinding tests
description: Test pathfinding: deterministic paths, neighbor order, unreachable handling. ACCEPTANCE: All pathfinding tests pass.

title: [Descent] D2b Procgen + validation + fallback
description: Create assets/scripts/descent/procgen.lua. Generate floors to spec sizes. Walkable start/stairs (floors 1-4). Reachable start->stairs (BFS). Quotas enforced. No overlaps. Fallback after MAX_ATTEMPTS with log. ACCEPTANCE: Tests pass for seeds 1-10.

title: [Descent] A2 Test runner + RUN_DESCENT_TESTS hook + watchdog
description: Create assets/scripts/tests/run_descent_tests.lua with TestRunner.reset(), TestRunner.run_all(). Hook into assets/scripts/core/main.lua. Implement 15s watchdog timeout. ACCEPTANCE: RUN_DESCENT_TESTS=1 exits 0 on pass, exits 1 on fail/timeout/module-load-error. Prints seed, test name, summary. Works without ENABLE_DESCENT=1.

title: [Descent] D2b-T Procgen validation tests
description: Test procgen: walkable start/stairs, reachability, quotas, no overlaps, fallback behavior. Seeds 1-10. ACCEPTANCE: All procgen tests pass.

title: [Descent] D2b-H Snapshot hash implementation
description: Implement canonical snapshot hashing per ยง5.3. Version/seed/floor/size/tiles/entities/items format. FNV-1a 32-bit hash. Tests assert hash equality. ACCEPTANCE: Snapshot hash deterministic across runs.

title: [Descent] D3 Stairs + floor transitions 1->5
description: Create assets/scripts/descent/floor_transition.lua. Stepping on stairs advances floor once per turn. Player state persists (HP/MP/XP/inventory/equipment/god/spells). Floor-local state resets. Floor 5 triggers boss hook. ACCEPTANCE: Transition tests pass, state persistence verified.

title: [Descent] D3-T Floor transition tests
description: Test floor transitions: single advancement, state persistence, floor-local reset, floor 5 boss trigger. ACCEPTANCE: All transition tests pass.

title: [Descent] E1 Combat math (spec-locked)
description: Create assets/scripts/descent/combat.lua. Hit chance clamp per spec. Damage floors at 0 after armor. Scripted RNG yields deterministic outcomes. Negative stats rejected with entity id/type error. ACCEPTANCE: Combat math tests pass.

title: [Descent] E1-T Combat math tests
description: Test combat: clamp ranges, damage floor, deterministic scripted RNG, negative stat rejection. ACCEPTANCE: All combat tests pass.

title: [Descent] E2 Enemy base + AI decision function
description: Create assets/scripts/descent/enemy.lua. AI logic: adjacent->attack, visible+path->move, visible+no path->idle, not visible->idle. Deterministic processing order. ACCEPTANCE: AI behavior tests pass.

title: [Descent] E2-1 Enemy: Goblin
description: Create assets/scripts/descent/enemies/goblin.lua. Basic melee enemy per spec. Stats match spec.lua. ACCEPTANCE: Goblin spawns and behaves correctly.

title: [Descent] E2-2 Enemy: Skeleton
description: Create assets/scripts/descent/enemies/skeleton.lua. Undead enemy per spec. Stats match spec.lua. ACCEPTANCE: Skeleton spawns and behaves correctly.

title: [Descent] E2-3 Enemy: Orc
description: Create assets/scripts/descent/enemies/orc.lua. Tough melee enemy per spec. Stats match spec.lua. ACCEPTANCE: Orc spawns and behaves correctly.

title: [Descent] A3 Evidence README
description: Create .sisyphus/evidence/descent/README.md documenting required artifacts: summary.md, run.log, screenshots, seeds used. Include tee commands and when UBS is required rule. ACCEPTANCE: README exists with all artifact requirements.

title: [Descent] E2-4 Enemy: Mage
description: Create assets/scripts/descent/enemies/mage.lua. Ranged/caster enemy per spec. Stats match spec.lua. ACCEPTANCE: Mage spawns and behaves correctly.

title: [Descent] E2-5 Enemy: Troll
description: Create assets/scripts/descent/enemies/troll.lua. High HP enemy per spec. Stats match spec.lua. ACCEPTANCE: Troll spawns and behaves correctly.

title: [Descent] E3 Enemy turn execution
description: Create assets/scripts/descent/actions_enemy.lua. No moves into occupied tiles. No overlaps after enemy phase. Iteration order stable and tested. Pathfinding nil handled (idle). ACCEPTANCE: Enemy turn tests pass.

title: [Descent] E3-T Enemy turn tests
description: Test enemy turn: no occupied moves, no overlaps, stable iteration, nil path handling. ACCEPTANCE: All enemy turn tests pass.

title: [Descent] F1 Player stats + XP/leveling
description: Create assets/scripts/descent/player.lua. XP thresholds match spec. Level-up recalculations per spec. Emits spell selection event hook. ACCEPTANCE: Leveling tests pass, event hook exists.

title: [Descent] F1-T Player leveling tests
description: Test player: XP thresholds, level-up stats, event emission. ACCEPTANCE: All player tests pass.

title: [Descent] F2 Items + inventory list UX
description: Create assets/scripts/descent/items.lua. Pickup/drop/use/equip works. Equip modifies combat stats via player.lua APIs. Capacity enforcement per spec. ACCEPTANCE: Inventory tests pass.

title: [Descent] F2-UI Inventory UI
description: Create assets/scripts/descent/ui/inventory.lua. List-based UX (no grid/tetris). Shows items, equipped indicator, capacity. Cancel/back works. ACCEPTANCE: Inventory UI functional, screenshot evidence.

title: [Descent] F2-T Inventory tests
description: Test inventory: pickup/drop/use/equip, capacity, swap/block behavior. ACCEPTANCE: All inventory tests pass.

title: [Descent] F3 Scroll identification
description: Create assets/scripts/descent/items_scrolls.lua. Labels randomized per run seed. Labels unique within run. Identification persists and updates display. ACCEPTANCE: Scroll ID tests pass.

title: [Descent] A4 Just recipes for Descent tests
description: Add just test-descent recipe running ยง1.5. Optional just test-descent-headless for Linux xvfb-run. ACCEPTANCE: just test-descent runs Descent tests correctly.

title: [Descent] F3-T Scroll identification tests
description: Test scroll ID: seeded labels, uniqueness, persistence. ACCEPTANCE: All scroll tests pass.

title: [Descent] F4 Character creation UI
description: Create assets/scripts/descent/ui/char_create.lua. Must select species (Human) and background (Gladiator). Starting gear matches spec. Cancel returns to menu cleanly. ACCEPTANCE: Char create works, screenshot evidence.

title: [Descent] G1 Shop system
description: Create assets/scripts/descent/shop.lua. Shop on floor 1 per spec. Stock deterministic per seed+floor. Purchase atomic. Insufficient gold shows message, 0 turns. Reroll cost enforced, deterministic. ACCEPTANCE: Shop tests pass.

title: [Descent] G1-UI Shop UI
description: Create assets/scripts/descent/ui/shop.lua. Shows stock, prices, gold. Buy/sell/reroll buttons. Cancel/back works. ACCEPTANCE: Shop UI functional, screenshot evidence.

title: [Descent] G1-T Shop tests
description: Test shop: floor 1 spawn, stock determinism, purchase atomicity, gold check, reroll. ACCEPTANCE: All shop tests pass.

title: [Descent] G2 God system (Trog)
description: Create assets/scripts/descent/god.lua. Altars per spec floors/odds. Worship persists across floors. Trog blocks spell cast with message, 0 turns. ACCEPTANCE: God system tests pass.

title: [Descent] G2-UI Altar UI
description: Create assets/scripts/descent/ui/altar.lua. Shows god info, worship confirmation. Cancel/back always available. ACCEPTANCE: Altar UI functional, screenshot evidence.

title: [Descent] G2-T God system tests
description: Test god: altar spawn, worship persistence, Trog spell block. ACCEPTANCE: All god tests pass.

title: [Descent] G3 Spells + targeting + MP usage
description: Create assets/scripts/descent/spells.lua. Spell selection on level-up. Casts validate MP, LOS, range. Damage/heal deterministic. ACCEPTANCE: Spell tests pass.

title: [Descent] G3-UI Targeting UI
description: Create assets/scripts/descent/ui/targeting.lua. Shows valid targets, range indicator. Cancel exits targeting. ACCEPTANCE: Targeting UI functional.

title: [Descent] B0 Mode init + AUTO_START_DESCENT plumbing
description: Create assets/scripts/descent/init.lua. Implement AUTO_START_DESCENT=1 to boot directly into Descent. Require-safe (no timers at require-time). Exiting returns to main menu cleanly. ACCEPTANCE: AUTO_START_DESCENT=1 DESCENT_SEED=123 boots Descent, exit returns to menu, no lingering state.

title: [Descent] G3-1 Spell: Magic Missile
description: Implement Magic Missile spell. Ranged damage, LOS required, MP cost per spec. ACCEPTANCE: Spell works per spec.

title: [Descent] G3-2 Spell: Heal
description: Implement Heal spell. Self-target HP restore, MP cost per spec. ACCEPTANCE: Spell works per spec.

title: [Descent] G3-3 Spell: Blink
description: Implement Blink spell. Random short-range teleport, MP cost per spec. Deterministic with RNG. ACCEPTANCE: Spell works per spec.

title: [Descent] G3-T Spell tests
description: Test spells: selection trigger, MP/LOS/range validation, deterministic damage/heal. ACCEPTANCE: All spell tests pass.

title: [Descent] H1 Boss floor rules + arena
description: Create assets/scripts/descent/floor5.lua. Floor 5 arena spawns per spec. Boss phases trigger at spec thresholds. Win condition triggers victory. Runtime errors route to error screen. ACCEPTANCE: Boss tests pass.

title: [Descent] H1-AI Boss AI + phases
description: Create assets/scripts/descent/boss.lua. Multi-phase boss behavior per spec. Phase transitions at HP thresholds. Distinct abilities per phase. ACCEPTANCE: Boss AI works, tests pass.

title: [Descent] H1-T Boss tests
description: Test boss: arena spawn, phase triggers, win condition, error handling. ACCEPTANCE: All boss tests pass.

title: [Descent] H2 Endings UI framework
description: Create assets/scripts/descent/ui/endings.lua. Framework for victory/death/error screens. Shows seed, turns, floor, kills, cause. Return to menu works with cleanup. ACCEPTANCE: Ending screens work.

title: [Descent] H2-V Victory screen
description: Implement victory screen in endings.lua. Shows win stats, seed, option to return to menu. ACCEPTANCE: Victory screen functional, screenshot evidence.

title: [Descent] H2-D Death screen
description: Implement death screen in endings.lua. Shows death cause, stats, seed, option to return to menu. ACCEPTANCE: Death screen functional, screenshot evidence.

title: [Descent] B1 Menu entry + ENABLE_DESCENT gating
description: Edit assets/scripts/ui/main_menu_buttons.lua (chokepoint). Show Descent entry only with ENABLE_DESCENT=1. ACCEPTANCE: With flag, menu shows Descent and entering works. Without flag, no visible/accessible route.

title: [Descent] H2-E Error screen
description: Implement error screen in endings.lua. Shows error message, seed, stack trace if available. Return to menu. In test mode, ensures exit 1. ACCEPTANCE: Error screen works.

title: [Descent] H3 5-run soak + timing evidence
description: Run 5 complete playthroughs without crash/hang. Record 3+ timed runs. Compare to 15-20 min target. If out of band, propose tuning knobs. Seeds 101-105. ACCEPTANCE: Soak evidence in .sisyphus/evidence/descent/

title: [Descent] S1 State management (descent/state.lua)
description: Create assets/scripts/descent/state.lua. Central game state container. Floor state, player state, UI state. Clean reset on new game. ACCEPTANCE: State module works, no global state leaks.

title: [Descent] S2 Error handling + routing
description: Implement error boundary in descent/init.lua. Runtime errors route to error ending screen. In test mode, exits 1 with seed+error. ACCEPTANCE: Errors handled gracefully, tests verify.

title: [Descent] S3 Determinism lint commands
description: Add lint command to verify no math.random in descent modules. Document in AGENTS.md. ACCEPTANCE: rg 'math\.random' assets/scripts/descent finds nothing.

title: [Descent] S4 Integration test: full run seed 42
description: Create integration test: full game with seed 42. Verify deterministic map, enemy spawns, combat outcomes. ACCEPTANCE: Same seed = identical game.

title: [Descent] S5 Smoke test suite
description: Create assets/scripts/tests/test_descent_smoke.lua. Basic require tests, state init, module loading. ACCEPTANCE: Smoke tests pass.

title: [Descent] S6 HUD floor/turn/position display
description: Extend descent/ui/hud.lua to show floor number, turn count, player position. Always visible during gameplay. ACCEPTANCE: HUD shows all required info.

title: [Descent] S7 Death/victory seed logging
description: On death/victory, log seed to terminal and show on screen. Enables reproduction of interesting runs. ACCEPTANCE: Seed visible and logged.

title: [Descent] S8 Movement 4-way vs 8-way (spec decision)
description: Implement movement per spec decision. If 8-way, include diagonal corner-cutting rules. Key bindings documented. ACCEPTANCE: Movement matches spec exactly.

title: [Descent] C1 Turn manager FSM
description: Create assets/scripts/descent/turn_manager.lua. Implement PLAYER_TURN -> ENEMY_TURN -> PLAYER_TURN cycle. Invalid/no-op input consumes 0 turns. dt independence: no input for N frames does not advance turns. ACCEPTANCE: FSM transitions correct, tests pass.

title: [Descent] S9 Entity rendering layer
description: Render player, enemies, items on map. Visible vs explored distinction. Use existing sprite/tile system. ACCEPTANCE: Entities render correctly.

title: [Descent] S10 Wall/floor tile rendering
description: Render walls and floors with visible/explored distinction. Unexplored areas hidden. ACCEPTANCE: Map renders with proper visibility.

title: [Descent] C1-T Turn manager tests
description: Create tests for turn_manager.lua. Test FSM transitions, invalid input handling, dt independence. ACCEPTANCE: All turn manager tests pass, coverage for edge cases.

title: [Descent] C2 Map grid + occupancy API
description: Create assets/scripts/descent/map.lua. Rectangular maps for all spec sizes. Occupancy prevents overlaps (player/enemy/item/stairs). Coordinate conversion helpers deterministic and bounds-safe. ACCEPTANCE: Tests verify map sizes, occupancy, bounds safety.
